CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBehave
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
self.ParentAI.time = self.ParentAI.time + delta
local CurrentStateName = self.ParentAI.Entity.StateComponent.CurrentStateName
if CurrentStateName == "DEAD" or CurrentStateName == "HIT" or CurrentStateName == "ATTACK" then return BehaviourTreeStatus.Failure else return BehaviourTreeStatus.Success end
